name: Archer Master Jungle
description:
This time only your archery hunting skills will be focused, Take the chance to relive the age of stones where deer hunting was done through arrow shooting and here you have a chance of bow deer hunting as well as other animal hunting because this is a big game hunting season.

Game Features
- Lethal bows to shoot.
- Breathtaking hunting animal’s missions.
- Realistic 3D environment
- Ancient animal hunter with old hunter dress.
- Accurate archery stimulator
- Realistic ambient jungle sound.
- Realistic 3D stunning and amazing animations.
- Real-time Archer Arrow throwing physics for jungle hunting.
- Smooth and simple controls.
- User friendly interface and interactive graphics.
- Free big hunting game.
